availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry J. Sheets (Franklin County, Kentucky blacksmith and soldier)

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky blacksmith and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of John and Elizabeth Sheets. Married Martha A. Martin on December 21, 1854. Father of John C. Sheets, Ida J. Sheets, Ann E. Sheets, James B. Sheets, and Millie Sheets. Served in Company E, 9th Regiment Kentucky Cavalry (U.S.A.) as 1st Lieutenant from August 22, 1862 to October 31, 1862 and then as Captain from November 1, 1862 to August 21, 1863.
